comment.author: 22812192@N00
comment._content: Very cool! I'm curious what the lineage is of the vehicle in the photograph. NASA Tweetup attendees just (November 10, 2010) saw a vehicle very similar in basic design at NASA's Johnson Space Center in Houston, TX. The vehicle we saw was called "Centaur 2" and is intended as Robonaut 2's mobility platform on the moon. Photographs of Centaur 2: www.flickr.com/photos/wildtexas/tags/centaur2/
